episodes.title: Every Korean Major Cult explained in 13 minutes
episodes.description:
South Korea has over 300 active religious cults — and some of them are richer, more organized, and more dangerous than you think.

From Shincheonji, the secretive church that went viral during COVID…
To JMS, exposed for decades of abuse…
To the Unification Church, a global empire with political influence from Seoul to Washington…
This video dives deep into the biggest and most infamous cults in South Korea — the ones behind mass weddings, apocalyptic predictions, real estate empires, and national tragedies.

We cover:

Shincheonji Church of Jesus

JMS (Jesus Morning Star)

Unification Church (Moonies)

The Salvation Sect and the Sewol Ferry Disaster

Dami Mission’s failed rapture

The Young Disciples of Jesus

No sensationalism. No fluff. Just the truth — with bite.
